message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at its true value. Let me know if you're interested!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product,  $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying right now.  Would you consider $110? I'm very interested in the product and I believe this price reflects a fair value for both of us.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. How about $115 for the product? This still allows us to maintain a fair profit while making the product accessible to you.
